Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the movie 'Iqbal' released in 2005?
Options:
A. A) Shreyas Talpade plays the role of Iqbal Saeed Khan.
B. B) Iqbal Saeed Khan is a character in the movie 'Iqbal'.
C. C) Shreyas Talpade directed the movie 'Iqbal'.
D. D) The movie 'Iqbal' revolves around a young boy's dream of becoming a cricketer.
Correct Answer: A) Shreyas Talpade plays the role of Iqbal Saeed Khan., B) Iqbal Saeed Khan is a character in the movie 'Iqbal'., D) The movie 'Iqbal' revolves around a young boy's dream of becoming a cricketer.
